forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 37F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High near 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening will become intermittent in the overnight hours. Low -2C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 40F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
